elements.title: Climate Emergency
elements.description: list of local authorities of all political persuasions that have declared climate & ecological emergencies and are creating action plans to deliver on their ambitions. Head to section [action plans](https://data.climateemergency.uk/) for the full dataset

elements.title: UK100
elements.description: UK100 is the only network for UK locally elected leaders who have pledged to play their part in the global effort to avoid the worst impacts of climate change by switching to 100% clean energy by 2050.

elements.title: A list of energy startups
elements.description: A list of energy startups classified by sources, countries, technologies

elements.title: A running list of Climate Tech startups and VCs
elements.description: a list of companies that caught Pietro Invernizzi attention in the space of climate tech

elements.title: A running list of Climate Tech VCs
elements.description: We bring you perspective on the evolving world of climate tech by interviewing top investors & operators and covering recent venture deals, news, and jobs.
